name: Blark and Son
overview: Blark and Son follows the adventures of Blark as he struggles to bond with his son who he loves more than anything else in the world.

episodes.name: Blark Plans the Ultimate Father-Son Bonding Day
episodes.overview: Blark tries to bond with Son. Son goes on a hunt with Blark.

episodes.name: Blark vs. Son's Teacher
episodes.overview: Son tells Blark about his favorite teacher. Blark builds a school.

episodes.name: The Handsomest Neighbor in the World
episodes.overview: Blark man-crushes on the new neighbor to try and reap the second hand benefits of his beauty. Son gets dragged to dinner.

episodes.name: Blark Strives for Immortality
episodes.overview: Son writes a report on a family member. Blark struggles with his legacy.

episodes.name: Blark Is the Worst Wingman Ever
episodes.overview: Son tries to impress a girl from school. Blark plays wingman.

episodes.name: The Scariest Story on the Internet
episodes.overview: Son struggles with an irrational fear. Blark enlists Staceyâ€™s help.

episodes.name: A Friendship So Good It'll Make You Jealous
episodes.overview: Blarkâ€™s old war buddy comes to visit. Son takes issue.

episodes.name: Only an Ex-GI Can Stop This Embarrassing Dad
episodes.overview: Son opens up to Regina. Blark tries to help. Fletch stops Blark at all costs.

episodes.name: The Internet Will Turn You Into a Jerk
episodes.overview: In the wake of finding out Regina has a boyfriend, Son takes advice from a macho online personality and starts acting like a total jerk.

episodes.name: Murder Is a Terrible Way to Teach a Lesson
episodes.overview: When Son tells a lie, Blark goes overboard in teaching him a lesson.

episodes.name: Stacey Goes Into a Downward Spiral
episodes.overview: When Stacey misses his chance to own a priceless coin, his downward spiral gets even worse.

episodes.name: Fletch's Anger Management Lesson
episodes.overview: Fletch teaches Son how to deal with and control all the anger he's feeling now that Regina is dating his friend Zeke.

episodes.name: The Adults Are Not Alright
episodes.overview: When the internet goes out, Son comes to learn an important lesson about the adults in his life.

episodes.name: Son Loves Regina
episodes.overview: Zeke thinks Regina is having an affair with Son and plots a terrible revenge.

episodes.name: A Very Fateful Sleepover
episodes.overview: Blark finds Stacey in a vulnerable place after he drops off Junior for a sleepover.

episodes.name: Blark and Son Learn the Ultimate Lesson
episodes.overview: In the touching season finale of Blark and Son, father and son learn to respect each other as men.
